body.note: The Installer should review the STS for connections and safety prior to final positioning and installation.
body.p:
If any loose connections are found during the installation, contact Eaton Service (1-800-843-9433).
Check these connections to make sure vibration has not loosened the terminal screws.
Input source and MCCBs
Bypass MCCBs
Isolation MCSW(s)
Check these feeders:
Check the feeders running from the load side of the input and bypass breakers.
Check the feeders running to the Isolation MCCB or MCSW.
Check all lugs on the following for tightness:
Neutral Bus
Ground Bus
Bus bars
Circuit breakers
SCR switch modules
